alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Otero, northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northwest of Pritchett, or 30 miles west of Springfield, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Otero, northwestern Baca, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
